answers.answer: Have you ever been checked for diabetes. thats how I feel when my sugar is high.

No, never been checked. I have no family history and am a pretty healthy normal weight 30 year old, I really hope that's not the case. I go in for spine x-rays next week, and then on to an MRI....I hope this figures it out for me. Thanks for the reply.

question: I am currently getting over a case of pneumonia that took me out for about a month. My question is, and I'm not sure it is related to being sick, but I have strong electrical like vibrations that move through my body when i bend my neck or bend over now. It is quite uncomfortable and I feel it from my head, to my hands, mid-section, and down to my knees. I'm a little worried and am wondering what is going on.
title: Pneumonia and electrical vibrations throughout body
